## download-webapp-sources package

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [fetchFile(normalizedUrlOrFilename, dependencies)](./download-webapp-sources.fetchfile.md) | Fetch method which can take a filepath or a URL. |
|  [getAggregatedSourceContents(urlsOrPaths, dependencies)](./download-webapp-sources.getaggregatedsourcecontents.md) | The main method. End-to-end conversion of list of .js or .js.map filepaths/URLs to source contents. |
|  [getSourceContents(normalizedSourceMappingURL, sourceMapConsumer, dependencies)](./download-webapp-sources.getsourcecontents.md) | Tries both <code>sourcesContent</code> and <code>sources</code> paths |
|  [getSourceMappingURL(compiledContent)](./download-webapp-sources.getsourcemappingurl.md) | Utility method to extract un-normalized sourceMappingURL from .js content. |
|  [normalizeSourceMappingURL(compiledJsUrlOrFilename, sourcemapRelativeUrl, dependencies)](./download-webapp-sources.normalizesourcemappingurl.md) | Utility method to make a relative URL like "bundle.js.map" into a resolvable URL like "https://example.com/bundle.js.map" or "./example/bundle.js.map" |
